solution_line_template: You doubled a number to get {final_result} so in reverse, you would divide by {double_factor} so {final_result}/{double_factor} = <<{final_result}/{double_factor}={after_first_reverse_double}>>{after_first_reverse_double}

You added {added_value} to this number and in reverse, you would subtract by {added_value} so {after_first_reverse_double}-{added_value}= <<{after_first_reverse_double}-{added_value}={after_reverse_add}>>{after_reverse_add}

You doubled a number to get {after_reverse_add} so in reverse you would divide by {double_factor} so {after_reverse_add}/{double_factor} = <<{after_reverse_add}/{double_factor}={fastest_speed}>>{fastest_speed} is the fastest speed
